summary: Project involves an articles/content platform. User wants articles sorted by date in descending order (latest first).

existing_features.title: In the frontend, ensure all article listing pages (HomePage, PoliticalNewsPage, MovieNewsPage) and sidebar components (TopStoriesSidebar, BreakingNewsTicker) display articles in descending date order (latest first). If client-side sorting is needed to complement the backend change, apply a sort by date descending before rendering.

new_feature_requests.summary: Sort articles in descending order by date (latest articles shown first)
In the backend, update the query that returns all news articles so that results are sorted by date in descending order (newest articles first).
